00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Xml;
00025 #endregion
00026 
00027 namespace Utilities.Web.Netflix
00028 {
00032     public class Person
00033     {
00034         #region Constructor
00035 
00040         public Person(XmlElement Element)
00041         {
00042             foreach (XmlNode Children in Element.ChildNodes)
00043             {
00044                 if (Children.Name.Equals("id", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00045                 {
00046                     ID = Children.InnerText;
00047                 }
00048                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("name", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00049                 {
00050                     Name = Children.InnerText;
00051                 }
00052                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("bio", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00053                 {
00054                     Bio = Children.InnerText;
00055                 }
00056                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("link", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00057                 {
00058                     if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00059                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catlog/person/filmography",
00060                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00061                     {
00062                         Filmography = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00063                     }
00064                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00065                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("alternate",
00066                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00067                     {
00068                         Webpage = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00069                     }
00070                 }
00071             }
00072         }
00073 
00074         #endregion
00075 
00076         #region Properties
00077 
00081         public string ID { get; set; }
00082 
00086         public string Name { get; set; }
00087 
00091         public string Bio { get; set; }
00092 
00096         public string Filmography { get; set; }
00097 
00101         public string Webpage { get; set; }
00102 
00103         #endregion
00104     }
00105 }
